title: Colorado Rapids v Vancouver Whitecaps: Sorensen unconcerned by dip in form
description: Jesper Sorensen is confident the Vancouver Whitecaps will soon return to their top level. The Whitecaps started the season brilliantly, but a run of three defeats in the space of four MLS games has seen them relinquish top spot in the Western Conference. Vancouver suffered just one defeat in their first 16 matches of the […] The post Colorado Rapids v Vancouver Whitecaps: Sorensen unconcerned by dip in form appeared first on Soccer News.

title: Palace out of Europa League after Lyon ruling
description: UEFA has demoted Crystal Palace to the Conference League. Palace earned a spot in the Europa League for next season by winning the FA Cup in May. Yet the Eagles have now been pushed down to UEFA’s third-tier competition due to a multi-club ownership issue. UEFA refuse to allow clubs that are owned or partly […] The post Palace out of Europa League after Lyon ruling appeared first on Soccer News.
